rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light and greenery integrated as per Vastu principles.
Open-plan living and dining space that fosters family interaction and eco-friendly design with natural ventilation and ample windows.
A landscaped courtyard that provides a green oasis in the center of the house, promoting natural light and air circulation.
A dedicated space for work with soundproofing and ample storage, strategically placed as per Vastu guidelines to enhance concentration.
A private room for guests or additional family members; designed with natural materials and eco-friendly insulation.

openings.description: Large entrance door placed in the north as per Vastu for inviting positive energy.
Multiple windows strategically placed to allow cross ventilation and natural light.
Openings around the courtyard walls that connect indoor spaces with the outdoor area.
